itemInfo.itemDesc:
A dried fish that was stir-fried with grain powder. 

- Unique Effect: Restore +5 Worker Stamina (Use through the Worker Menu on the world map)

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 1 sec

item.name: Salt
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Mudskipper
item.desc: An ingredient that can be sold to a Trader or used in Cooking. It can be obtained through Fishing.\n- Usage: Fried Fish, Steamed Fish, Fish Soup, etc.

item.name: Wheat Flour
item.desc:
A fine flour made by Grinding.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Wheat.

- Usage: Essence of Liquor, Meat Stew, Oatmeal, etc.

item.name: White Sauce
item.desc:
A white sauce used for Cooking.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Stir-Fried Seafood
